titleStmt.title: A new way of hunting: or, The hunting of the wild boar: being a compendious dialogue between two lovers, to the tune of, Draw the curtaines.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Grove on Snow Hill,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, printed side by side.
At head of second part: Her answer, the second part, to the same tune; at foot of second part: And entered according to order.
L copy at BR f 821.04 B49(9), mutilated, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
